generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with visible lane markings, consistent with a road used for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: There are paved areas adjacent to the road, separated by curbs or vegetation, suitable for pedestrian use.
- building: Multi-story residential buildings are visible on both sides of the street.
- vegetation: Trees with green foliage are present along the road and in front of the buildings.
- person: A person can be seen standing near the parked cars on the left side of the image.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along both sides of the road.
- pole: A street light pole is visible on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: A circular traffic sign is mounted on a pole on the right side of the road.
- terrain: Small patches of grass are visible along the sidewalk and between parked cars.
